heading: Locally-crafted, world-inspired
description: Upping the suite game in the luxury Pinisi market, there are 6+1 cabins specially-designed by a group of land-based designers to give a modern look that's a floating reflection of a world-class resort.

data.caption: admiral suite
data.heading: Zheng He
data.text: Of the ship's 6+1 suites, the 120 sqm Admiral Suite is the largest master suite on a Phinisi cruise in the market. Being the only suite on the bridge deck, it offers full privacy, its own balcony, and a 270ยบ view of the ocean.

data.caption: admiral suite
data.heading: Zheng He
data.text: Of the ship's 6+1 suites, the 120 sqm Admiral Suite is the largest master suite on a Phinisi cruise in the market. Being the only suite on the bridge deck, it offers full privacy, its own balcony, and a 270ยบ view of the ocean.

data.caption: commodore suite
data.heading: Columbus
data.text: As far as space is concerned, this comes in a close second. Private en-suite bathroom, permanent queen bed, and closet. Built-in dresser with writing desk. Located on the main deck and is near the main lounge and dining room.
